resources.string: BOSM Roulette is a virtual money betting app where you bet on teams participating in BOSM\'19 using BitsCoin.

You can bet any amount your wallet permits.\n If you win, you earn back your BitsCoin with 25% extra plus a bonus. The lesser the relative bets on your team, the higher the bonus.\n If you lose, you only get 25% of your BitsCoin back.

The My Bets tab displays the matches you\'ve bet on. A green status indicates a successful bet, a red status indicates a failed bet and an orange status indicates that the match is either ongoing or has ended in a draw. \nThe amount indicates the BitCoin received from a bet.
Spin the Rouleete wheel every hour to win exciting rewards. You can track your standing on the Leaderboard. Exciting Prizes await the top rank holders.\n\nLet the gambling begin!
